title: Mass Effect: Andromeda – Standalone Patch from v1.04 to v1.05
body:
MEA Delta Patch from v1.04 to v1.05 CrackFix v2, 528 MB

WARNING! Works only on cracked CPY version v1.04. No backups are made during patching, so backup the whole game folder just in case.

Links below updated with Fixed CrackFix (let’s call it V2)

1) Download
http://www82.zippyshare.com/v/vY152ZJG/file.html
http://www82.zippyshare.com/v/giDGi3L8/file.html
http://www82.zippyshare.com/v/me2LlKu6/file.html

2) UnRAR to installed game folder
3) Run patch.bat and wait a couple of minutes.
4) Make sure that QuickSFV shows no errors upon completion. If there are errors (related to your localization), restore the game from your backup. In example, if you see missing files for French or German locals and you don’t play in those langs – you may ignore those errors.

If you already installed my patch to v1.05, get just fixed crack files here:
http://www39.zippyshare.com/v/0ym1d9bn/file.html
http://uptobox.com/zdfh6wjann15
https://openload.co/f/98porZNGXkI/

An updated repack will follow, probably tomorrow. Will be mostly backwards compatible with my initial one. But this patch is faster if you’re already have the game installed.
